```{r Load, results='hide'}
loadFiles <- paste0(params$inputDir, params$inputFiles, ".rda")
lapply(loadFiles, load, .GlobalEnv)
loadedObjects <- ls()
loadedObjects <- loadedObjects[loadedObjects != "params"]
```
